    • Constructor Detail

      • NearDuplicates

        public NearDuplicates(java.lang.String folder,
                      int numPermutations,
                      double threshold)
        Creates an instance of NearDuplicates
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder containing the documents to compare
        numPermutations - The number of permutations to use when creating the MinHash matrix
        threshold - The similarity threshold to use when comparing documents

    • Method Detail

      • nearDuplicateDetector

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nearDuplicateDetector(java.lang.String docName)
        Returns a list of documents that are at least s-similar to docName
        Parameters:
        docName - The name of the document
        Returns:
        A list of documents

      • chooseBandCount

        private int chooseBandCount(int numPermutations,
                            double threshold)
        Choose the most ideal band count based on the provided threshold value. There may be a better way to compute this value.
        Parameters:
        numPermutations - The number of permutations used to build the MinHash matrix
        threshold - The similarity threshold
        Returns:
        The ideal number of bands for the provided threshold
